tools.description: This one is my favourite programming language. It gives me ability to develop software quicly and reliably, because i don't have to worry about memory safty thanks to borrow checker, and handling exception thanks to compiler. Robust type system gives me confidency in code that i am writing.

I don't really us it very often, I like it because software written in it is easy to revrite in Rust. I have some projects written in it but i generaly try avoiding C++ as much as I can, but I learned it still because i wanted to have something closer to hardware like C but with modern features and capabilities to use OOP.

I group this four together, because I use them mainly for front end. I prefere Typescript over Javascript, but i have projects written in both. When it comes to React, I choose it over angular because it was easier for me to use. Scss / Sass whas chosen by me because I already knew CSS but i wanted to have some more capabilities than that offered by plain CSS.

Mainly learned because it was easy and quick for prototyping something on go. I found it realy helpfull when i had to solve some problem that wasn't requireing good performance and could be easly implemented.
Database made out of Json files explains itself. For me it is one of the best methods of storing data that has to be used quickly and be sorted without creating crazy relations like in SQL.
Every startup starts with MongoDB and then switches to SQL. That is just how it is, SQL gives you ability to make giant databases and makes it fairly easy to manage them.
